bioghist.p: Charles Adshead Wright was born in 1899. He graduated from the University of Pennsylvania in 1922 with a B.S. in Economics. He received his M.A. in English Literature in 1929. He was the Director of Undergraduate Publications and Assistant Professor of Journalism at Temple University.

scopecontent.p: This collection of 25 binders is an accrual to the existing Charles Wright collection. Binders include text illustrated with family photographs, clippings, church bulletins, greeting cards and other items. The collection also includes a box of loose materials for the years 1975-1976 and a large volume of photocopies relating to a 1977 trip to Britain.
